euca-describe-images | grep precise-06172013-v6 IMAGE emi-432A3AAF precise-06172013-v6/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml 185153644748 available private x86_64 machine eki-015037CD eri-B7853880 instance-store [root@g-08-03 ~]# euca-delete-bundle -b precise-06172013-v6 -p precise-server-cloudimg-amd64.img --clear euca-delete-bundle: error (BucketNotEmpty): The bucket you tried to delete is not empty. {code} *AWS* {code} root@ip-10-62-87-202:~# ec2-describe-images ami-ed1e6f84 -K /tmp/cert/pk-WGRQ57KVHUFLNODZW53HEQJZWFLWDKQC.pem -C
